基本表格
caption
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter 
<table class="table">
    <caption>caption</caption>
    <thead>
    <tr>
        <th>First Name</th>
    </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
    <tr>
        <td>Mark</td>
    </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
条纹状表格
caption
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter 
<table class="table table-striped">
    <caption>caption</caption>
    <thead>
    <tr>
        <th>First Name</th>
    </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
    <tr>
        <td>Mark</td>
    </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
带边框的表格
caption
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter 
<table class="table table-bordered">
    <caption>caption</caption>
    <thead>
    <tr>
        <th>First Name</th>
    </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
    <tr>
        <td>Mark</td>
    </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
鼠标悬停
caption
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter 
<table class="table table-hover">
    <caption>caption</caption>
    <thead>
    <tr>
        <th>First Name</th>
    </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
    <tr>
        <td>Mark</td>
    </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
单元格及行的样式
@fat Mark Mark Otto @mdo Jacob Thornton Otto
Mark Otto @mdo Jacob Thornton @fat Mark Otto
Mark Otto @mdo Jacob Thornton @fat Mark Otto
Mark Otto @mdo Jacob Thornton @fat Mark Otto 
<!-- On rows -->
<tr class="active">...</tr>
<tr class="success">...</tr>
<tr class="warning">...</tr>
<tr class="danger">...</tr>
<tr class="info">...</tr>

<!-- On cells (`td` or `th`) -->
<tr>
    <td class="active">...</td>
    <td class="success">...</td>
    <td class="warning">...</td>
    <td class="danger">...</td>
    <td class="info">...</td>
</tr>
